name: MEC Fusion Jane Wetsuit - Women's
description:
A super-comfy paddling wetsuit with amazing flex and mobility. The Fusion series combines years of material development with sophisticated patterning to produce neoprene that’s more comfortable to wear while you're active, and warmer in the water if you swim.Four-way super-stretch neoprene provides maximum comfort, fit, and mobility.3mm insulation through core and legs.Crotch zipper for easier pit stops.Ankle zippers simplify on and off.

Body fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering
